begin
description: Begin running the engine. This will perform initial setup, call the onInit function, and begin the game loop

name: src/FontData/Font.js
Font
description:
Represents a font. Data is stored similarly to tilesets in an array, with the ability to remap characters
that have a unicode point larger than the array can hold.

name: baseIndexForChar
description: Get the base index in the data array for the character

params.name: charCode
params.description: the unicode point for the character

name: widthForChar
description: Get the width of a character

params.name: charCode
params.description: the unicode point for the character

name: src/FontData/FontData.js
FontData
description: Holds all of the font data

name: src/index.js
src/Input/Input.js
Input
description: Handle game input

name: init
description: Do initial setup. Add event listeners.

name: clearInput
description: clear out all of the input

name: pollInput
description: Update the input, should be done first thing in the game loop.

name: getKeyPressed
description: return true if the key is currently held down

name: getKeyDown
description: return true if the key was pressed down this frame

name: getKeyUp
description: return true if the key was released this frame

name: getButtonPressed
description: return true if the button is currently held down

name: getButtonDown
description: return true if the button was pressed down this frame

name: getButtonUp
description: return true if the button was released this frame

name: src/Input/Keys.js

MapData
description: Holds all of the Tile Map data.

name: addTileMap
description: Add a tilemap from a data object

name: getTile
description: Get the tile GID at a given position

params.name: tileMap
params.description: The index of the tile map you are checking

params.name: layer
params.description: The index of the layer on the tile map you are checking

name: setTile
description: Set the tile GID at a given position

params.name: tileMap
params.description: The index of the tile map you are setting

params.name: layer
params.description: The index of the layer on the tile map you are setting

name: src/MapData/TileMap.js
TileMap
description: Represents a Tile Map.

name: _getTypedArrayFromDataLayer
description: Convert an array of numbers into a Uint16Array

name: getTile
description: Get the tile GID at a given position

params.name: layer
params.description: The index of the layer on the tile map you are checking

name: setTile
description: Set the tile GID at a given position

params.name: layer
params.description: The index of the layer on the tile map you are setting

name: src/Screen/Screen.js
Screen
description:
Represents a game screen for low resolution games.
Has simple drawing functions using an indexed palette of a maximum of 256 colors
The origin (0, 0) position of the screen is on the bottom left

name: init
description: Do initial setup such as creating the canvas and building the palette

name: setPalette
description:
Set the palette that will used by the Screen.
All colors are drawn fully opaque exept for the palette index at 0 which is transparent

params.name: palette
params.description:
The array of colors to be used by the screen.
Each index should be a color described by an array of 3 integers in rgb order.
Each integer has a min value of 0 and a max value of 255.

name: setPaletteColorAtIndex
description: Change a single palette color

params.name: color
params.description: The color we want to add

params.name: index
params.description: this palette index we want to set

name: _buildPalette
description: Build the palette by converting _palette to the _generatedPalette we will be using internally

name: setPixel
description:
Set a pixel on the screen.
The origin (0, 0) of the screen is on the bottom left

name: setPixelUnsafe
description: Set a pixel on the screen, without doing any bounds checking

name: getPixel
description: Get the pallete index at a given position on the screen

name: clear
description: Fill the screen with the given palette index

params.name: paletteId
params.description: the palette index / defaults to 0 if unspecified

name: drawLine
description: Draw a line between 2 positions

name: _drawLineLow
description: Draw a line with a slope less than or equal to 1

name: _drawLineHigh
description: Draw a line with a slope greater than 1

name: drawRect
description: Draw a filled rectangle

name: drawRectBorder
description: Draw a rectangle border

name: drawCircle
description: Draw a filled circle

params.name: centerX
params.description: the x coordinate of the center of the circle

params.name: centerY
params.description: the y coordinate of the center of the circle

name: drawCircleBorder
description: Draw a circle border

params.name: centerX
params.description: the x coordinate of the center of the circle

params.name: centerY
params.description: the y coordinate of the center of the circle

name: _drawCircleFilledOctants
description: helper method for drawing filled circles

name: _drawCircleBorderOctants
description: helper method for drawing circle borders

name: drawTile
description: Draw a tile

params.name: x
params.description: the x position on the screen

params.name: y
params.description: the y position on the screen

name: drawMap
description: Draw a TileMap layer to the screen

params.name: x
params.description: origin x position on the TileMap

params.name: y
params.description: origin y position on the TileMap

params.name: width
params.description: how many tiles wide to draw

params.name: height
params.description: how many tiles high to draw

params.name: screenX
params.description: origin x position on the screen

params.name: screenY
params.description: origin y position on the screen

params.name: map
params.description: the index of the tilemap to draw

params.name: layer
params.description: the index of the layer to draw

name: drawText
description:
Draw a line of text to the screen.
Newlines are not supported, this will draw just a single line

params.name: x
params.description: the x position on the screen to draw to

params.name: y
params.description: the y position on the screen to draw to

params.name: paletteId
params.description: the palette if for the main color

params.name: outlinePaletteId
params.description: the palette id for the outline color

params.name: font
params.description: the index of the font to use

name: drawChar
description: Draw an individual character to the screen

params.name: x
params.description: the x position on the screen to draw to

params.name: y
params.description: the y position on the screen to draw to

params.name: paletteId
params.description: the palette id for the main color

params.name: outlinePaletteId
params.description: the palette id for the outline color

params.name: font
params.description: the index of the font to use

name: drawScreen
description: draw the data from {@link _screenData} to the canvas

TileData

name: init
description: Parse all of the tilesets and add them to the data array

name: addTileset
description: Add a tileset

name: getGid
description: Get the GID for a tile
